message: Let's split it 60/40. A fair deal for us both to settle this quickly.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering I'm taking the risk of rejecting your offer. Let's get this done!
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll come down a bit, 55/45.  Every round costs us money!
Okay, I'll meet you halfway. 55/45 is a good compromise, let's end this.
